title: Do You Remember?
description:
As a big horror game enthusiast—especially of those styled after VHS tapes or the PlayStation 2 era—I wanted to make an attempt at creating one myself. I worked alone on this project and set a strict timeline of one week from start to finish. In this game, you follow a path of decisions that lead to different endings, each with its own distinct outcome and effects.

  • Concept, design, and full development
  • Multiple endings with branching outcomes
  • Classic retro visuals/sounds
  • Year: 2023
  • Platform: PC
  • Engine: Unity
